entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 then light this evening. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 5:24 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
